effect.en: This attack does 20 damage for each of your Rapid Strike Pokémon in play.
effect.fr: Cette attaque inflige 20 dégâts pour chacun de vos Pokémon Mille Poings en jeu.
effect.es: Este ataque hace 20 puntos de daño por cada uno de tus Pokémon Golpe Fluido en juego.
effect.it: Questo attacco infligge 20 danni per ogni tuo Pokémon Colpo Rapido in gioco.
effect.pt: Este ataque causa 20 pontos de dano para cada um dos seus Pokémon Golpe Fluido em jogo.
effect.de: Diese Attacke fügt für jedes deiner Fließender-Angriff-Pokémon im Spiel 20 Schadenspunkte zu.

description.en: The six of them work together as one Pokémon. Teamwork is also their battle strategy, and they constantly change their formation as they fight.
